## AlTriggeredEventCallback type

Callback type for triggered events.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AlTriggeredEventCallback<ResponseType> = {
    (event: AlTriggeredEvent<ResponseType>): void | boolean;
};
```
